Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1982...
Released by New York (A) on 3/2/1982...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1982 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/25/1982 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1983, off Larry Andersen (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/1983, off Mike Proly (STL)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (N) on 6/7/1983...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Houston on 7/13/1984...
